mean_en: a situation in which a large group of people try to take political control of their own country with violence
sentence: Peasants always start insurrections during bad years with food shortages.
sentence_trans: 农民总在灾年因为缺少食物而发动造反。
word_etyma: in表强调 + surrect波浪 + ion名词后缀→ 大片反抗浪潮 → insurrection造反
